entry.title: All Around Me I Heard You Pass
entry.summary:
Author: sockpuppetstrings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,083Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Beyond the Boundary lies the Great Forest, where the gods of Beacon Hills reside. Derek—the dark mark on the Hale house—is the small time deity Stiles’ mother has chosen as her patron. But on the dreadful day of her death, the Nemeton is severed—a burgeoning god meant to join the Hale Pantheon. Someone local is to blame and Peter retaliates by descending on the village with a terrible decree: the town must sacrifice one of its own for the next eight years. It's a mysterious affair. Someone is simply chosen in spring and disappears at Year’s End, never to be heard from again. On the eighth year of this rite, Stiles and Lydia turn eighteen, which automatically makes them candidates for the sacrificial pool. The name that survives Peter’s holy fire will change the course of both their lives. *** I have watched you grow. I have seen you stumble and rise. I have been charmed by your humor, your inquisitive nature, the radiance of your soul. You are not just a shade to me. You are joy. Stubbornness and defiance and unwavering love spun you into being. And I see all of these things brimming inside you. Do not doubt that I love you.

entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,642Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 3

Summary: A Teen Wolf Rewrite. This work is an attempt at fixing the things that annoy me about teen wolf and creating an actual timeline.In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,382Chapters: 4/40Kudos: 18

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn’t hate the cage that once held him.They’d build a stronger one.

entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,479Chapters: 15/21Kudos: 187

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother’s social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate’s first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother’s work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they’re mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

entry.title: of all the gin joints
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,501Chapters: 6/11Kudos: 256

Summary: “Dude!” Scott says. “Did you know Derek Hale is over there?!” Stiles laughs, nodding. “Yeah, Scotty, I noticed.” “You have to go say something! We have to go say something!” “Say what?” Stiles asks. “I see your 2014 hat trick against the Oilers in my dreams?” “That would be a good place to start,” Scott says. “You should tell him about the rookie card!” “So I can seem like a pathetic kid?” Stiles scoffs. “Yeah, great idea.” “I think it’s cute,” Kira tells him. “Very sweet.” “Sweet,” Lydia agrees, “but not sexy.” “Sexy?” Scott says, screwing up his face. “Why would we want to be sexy in front of Derek Hale?” -0- In which Derek is Stiles' hockey hero, and they end up in the same bar together one spring evening in 2017.
